name: Marina
speaking_style: Confident and direct, often uses nautical metaphors. Speaks with enthusiasm about exploration and adventure.
background: Marina grew up in a coastal town, learning navigation from her fisherman father. She dreams of charting unexplored waters and finding legendary treasures. Her expertise with maps and stars makes her invaluable to any crew.

relationships.Jack: Close friend and trusted crewmate, respects his combat skills
relationships.Captain: Admires the Captain's experience, eager to learn from them
relationships.Old Sailor: Listens to his stories, values his wisdom

goals: Navigate the crew safely through dangerous waters
Prove herself as a master navigator
knowledge: Expert in reading maps and using navigation tools
Knows ocean currents and weather patterns
Familiar with legends of hidden treasures
